ca.hullabaloo.util.sax
Class XMLFilterChain

java.lang.Object
  ca.hullabaloo.util.sax.XMLFilterChain
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.XMLReader
public class XMLFilterChain
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.xml.sax.XMLReader

Provides an easy way to build a chain of XMLFilters. This does not implement XMLFilter, because I can't think of a clean way to do it -- does getParent() changes after every append??

          Creates a filter chain with an XMLReader at its head
